Metadata.title: JSONKit - All-in-one JSON Utility
Metadata.description: Free online JSON beautifier, validator, viewer, diff, and converter.

Landing.heroSubtitle: Beautify, validate, visualize, compare, and convert JSON data directly in your browser. Fast, secure, and free.

features.beautifyDesc: Format your JSON to be readable or compact it to save space.
features.validateDesc: Check your JSON for syntax errors with precise error reporting.
features.viewerDesc: Explore complex JSON structures with an interactive tree view.
features.compareDesc: Compare two JSON files side-by-side to find differences.
features.convertDesc: Convert JSON to YAML, XML, CSV and vice versa.

Beautify.title: JSON Beautifier & Minifier
Beautify.description: Format and pretty-print your JSON data to make it easier to read, or minify it to reduce file size without changing the data.

Validate.title: JSON Validator
Validate.description: Validate your JSON strings against the standard. Find syntax errors quickly with precise line numbers and error messages.

Viewer.title: JSON Tree Viewer
Viewer.description: Visualize your JSON data as an interactive tree. Expand, collapse, and explore complex nested structures effortlessly.
Viewer.enterValid: Enter valid JSON to view tree

Compare.title: JSON Diff & Compare
Compare.description: Compare two JSON objects side-by-side to see differences. Visual highlighting makes it easy to spot added, removed, or modified values.
Compare.instruction: Edit directly in the left (Original) and right (Modified) panels to compare.

Convert.title: JSON Converter
Convert.description: Convert JSON data to other popular formats like YAML, XML, and CSV. You can also convert these formats back to JSON.

Escape.title: JSON Escape & Unescape
Escape.description: Escape JSON strings for embedding in other JSON or code, or unescape previously escaped JSON strings back to their original format.
